Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a viral image that has been proven to be morphed.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image is not authentic and has been edited.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, which is that it is from a protest by police against the assault on a policeman by lawyers.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating bias in the provided claim.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no evidence of the claim faltering at times.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the image shows policemen holding placards against the NRC and CAB, when in fact it is a morphed image.
